items.sentence: There isn\'t a single country left on the gold standard.
Tom died trying to save a child from a burning building.
Tom divorced his first wife more than fifteen years ago.
I have to study hard to keep up with the other students.
I heard Tom complain about the cost of living in Boston.
I heard that a paralyzed man was eaten alive by maggots.
Tom doesn\'t want anyone to know he\'s going to do that.
You must validate your ticket before boarding the train.
Tom says he\'s willing to do just about anything for me.
I think Tom might\'ve said something he shouldn\'t have.
